ActVeterans Review and Appeal Board Act
PrecisAppointment of CORRADO MICALEF of Charlottetown, Prince Edward Island, to be a permanent member of the Veterans Review and Appeal Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective December 14, 2020.
